Submodules¶

uncle_PSL.psl2sam module¶

uncle_PSL.psl2sam.psl2sam(psl_handle, out_handle, reads, soft_clip=True, n_limit=None)[source]¶

Convert PSL data (BLAT output) into SAM format.

Parameters:
  • psl_handle – File handle for reading PSL data.
  • out_handle – File handle to write SAM output.
  • reads – Input reads as dictionary of SeqRecord objects.
  • soft_clip – Soft clip if true.
  • n_limit – Deletion size limit for using N operation.
Returns:

None
uncle_PSL.psl2sam.psl_rec2sam_rec(psl, sam_writer, reads, soft_clip, n_limit)[source]¶

Convert PSL record to SAM record.

Parameters:
  • psl – OrderedDict with PSL records.
  • sam_writer – SamWriter object.
  • reads – Input reads as dictionary of SeqRecord objects.
  • soft_clip – Soft clip if true.
  • n_limit – Deletion size limit for using N operation.
Returns:

SAM record.
Return type:

OrderedDict.

uncle_PSL.sam_writer module¶

class uncle_PSL.sam_writer.SamWriter(out_file, header=None)[source]¶

Simple class to write SAM files.

Initialise SAM writer object

close()[source]¶

Close SAM file.

Parameters:self – object
Returns:None
Return type:object
new_sam_record(qname, flag, rname, pos, mapq, cigar, rnext, pnext, tlen, seq, qual, tags)[source]¶

Create new SAM record structure.

Parameters:
  • self – object
  • qname – Read name.
  • rname – Reference name.
  • pos – Position in reference.
  • mapq – Mapping quality.
  • cigar – CIGAR string.
  • rnext – Reference of next read.
  • pnext – Position of next read.
  • tlen – Template length.
  • seq – Read sequence.
  • qual – Base qualities.
  • tags – Optional tags.
Returns:

SAM record.
Return type:

OrderedDict
write(record)[source]¶

Write SAM record to file.

Parameters:
  • self – object
  • record – SAM record.
Returns:

None
Return type:

object

uncle_PSL.seq_util module¶

uncle_PSL.seq_util.base_complement(k)[source]¶

Return complement of base.

Performs the subsitutions: A<=>T, C<=>G, X=>X for both upper and lower case. The return value is identical to the argument for all other values.

Parameters:k – A base.
Returns:Complement of base.
Return type:str
uncle_PSL.seq_util.reverse_complement(seq)[source]¶

Return reverse complement of a string (base) sequence.

Parameters:seq – Input sequence.
Returns:Reverse complement of input sequence.
Return type:str
